name: Reversi(Othello)-black&white
description:
Reversi (Othello) is a one of the most popular board games in the world. It is easy learn yet difficult to master, just like the Weichi and Gomoku.
Simple black&white pieces create an ever-changing composition. The more you play this chess game, the better you can achieve.
No more hesitation! Download now and ask your friends to join this game!
TIPS: Taking up the edges and corners could be useful.
